lesmer.avsnitt: Parental benefit is a substitute for your income when you are at home with your child.
You can receive a lump-sum grant if you are expecting a child and have not worked in the past year. In that case, you can get a one-off payment instead of parental benefit.

innhold.avsnitt: The answers you give to the questions below should be based on your situation before you are at home with the child.
